name: The Redspooks
description: Everyone but Illithyia goes to Nito's private island of evil and uses his sword to break the time barrier. Isen Sr dies

name: Greenshanks
description: We meet Greenshanks, Illithyia goes off with her to meet her mother.

name: Circle Time
description: Denaliah meets the full Circle of Eight

name: Zealeah Dies
description: Zealeah Dies and Denaliah follows Codvara to learn about when the ticking clock goes off
